Description: As title; when opening the properties of a wing that has been placed in plane symmetry mode, the wing that was placed by the symmetry system to match will flip over to point the top of the wing downwards. This happens to the same wing regardless of which wing properties button was pushed.

And with them open:

The issue resolves itself as soon as the wing properties menu is closed, with the wing flipping again.
